description: This file defines a repository interface for 'Note' entities in a Spring Data JPA context, providing method for paginated retrieval of notes by their owner.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for handling Note entities, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and a custom method to find notes by owner with pagination.

methods.name: findByOwner
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of notes associated with a specific user (owner).
